feed.title: Raeez Lorgat
feed.subtitle: Essays on programmable sovereignty, institutional design, and mathematics

entry.title: Open Source Special Economic Zone Legal, Fiscal & Regulatory Stack
entry.summary: Open source legal, fiscal, and regulatory infrastructure for special economic zones. Companion to the momentum-sez/stack public GitHub repository.

entry.title: Competitive Topologies & The Monopoly Problem: Why Democratic Institutions Need Competition
entry.summary: A response to Eric Schmidt and Andrew Sorota's "This is No Way to Rule a Country" on why democratic institutions require competitive pressure.

entry.title: Smart Assets
entry.summary: Programmable primitive on a novel decentralized network embedding compliance, identity, and operational intelligence directly into assets.

entry.title: Special Economic Zones in a Box
entry.summary: From proof of scale to proof of network.

entry.title: The Laboratory for Incentivization, Coordination and Cooperation (LICC)
entry.summary: Research laboratory for mechanism design and coordination problems.

entry.title: Moxie
entry.summary: Programmable loyalty and rewards for large-distribution brands.

entry.title: Momentum: Incubating Ecosystems
entry.summary: Investment thesis and methodology for incubating programmable institutions.

entry.title: Smart Buildings
entry.summary: Towards a programmable built environment operating system.

entry.title: Prefabricated Construction Methodologies
entry.summary: Analysis of modern prefabrication techniques and their application to rapid infrastructure deployment.

entry.title: Archai
entry.summary: Scalable primitives for land and community infrastructure ownership.

entry.title: Beauty
entry.summary: On learning mathematics because it was beautiful, from childhood raytracers to factorization algebras.

entry.title: /dev/finance inc.
entry.summary: The story of dropping out of MIT, flying up the Pacific coast with Patrick Collison, and building the payments infrastructure that became Stripe.
